conversation.text:
If you're interested in a sci-fi story with elements of mythology, "Prometheus" (2012) might be worth checking out. The movie explores the origins of humanity through the character of Prometheus. 

On the other hand, if you prefer a classic romantic tale with iconic actors, "Titanic" (1997) is a timeless choice. Starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet, the story follows their doomed love aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
